cast.overview: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.
cast.title: Raging Bull

details.biography: Mary has over 40 years experience in television and film industry as a Stunt Coordinator, Actor, and Director with memberships in Directors Guild of America and Screen Actors Guild.Mary Albee has been recognized as one of the top female stunt coordinators in the stunt industry. Recipient of the stunt industry's Special Lifetime Achievement Award from "Diamond in the Raw". Nominated for "Best Overall Stunt by a Stuntwoman" by the Red Bull Taurus Awards. She is a Director Guild of America (DGA) Second Unit Director member.
details.name: Mary Albee
